sections.description: The ST Resume WordPress theme is perfect for developers, UI/UX designers, and programmers. This theme is perfect for creating creative portfolios with retina-ready layouts and stunning features. In addition to personalisation options, a testimonial section, a banner, and social media integration, the ST Resume theme has many user-friendly features. For all job seekers looking for great jobs, this theme is elegant. The Elementor drag-and-drop page builder lets anyone create a website page, portfolio, project, blog post, or anything else without having any coding knowledge. ST Resume is a mobile-friendly and responsive theme, which can be used on desktops, tablets, smartphones, etc. It can be optimised from anywhere, anytime. It comes with a bunch of extra amazing features, including Google Fonts, Fully Responsive, Cross Browser & Clean Code, and Widgets. Regardless of the profession you work in, this theme is modern and professional enough to meet your needs.. ST Resume WP Theme Demo Page: https://spectrathemes.com/demo/st-resume-pro/
